info.name: Gmarks - Small Optimizations
info.description:
Change some styles of Gmarks addon.
1)The star icon of Gmarks is a little bit out of alignment(left-sided). This style will fix and set it on the center of the toolbar.
2)Remove dropdown triangles form folders. They are not necessary.

See also:
*Hide Bookmark Star Icon: http://userstyles.org/styles/20269
*Slim Toolbar: http://userstyles.org/styles/20267
